title: Please Help Me Riot
body:
RIOT Please reply :(
Bxxxxxxxxx   10:14 p.m.  Photos
To: info@riotgames.com

Please Respond =S

From: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
To: oceevents@riotgames.com
Subject: RE: Your Hoyts Enquiry - Issue ID :088052
Date: Fri, 15 Jan 2016 01:05:45 +1300

Hi,

I havent heard anything back regarding this yet, would just like to follow this up... 

Regards,
xxxxx

From: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
To: oceevents@riotgames.com
Subject: FW: Your Hoyts Enquiry - Issue ID :088052
Date: Thu, 31 Dec 2015 23:15:01 +1300

Hi Riot,

Please see the email I have below. 

I attended this event, and have now just today received my skincode - which has expired. 
Attached is a copy of my booking confirmation. 

My Summoners name is: GoldenTakeaways

I must say, it is very nice to finally get something from Riot, I have spent so much money on skins :D (this is a good thing, not a bad thing).

Seperate to this, Im not sure if you can do anything - but at the event, I was also given an Astro Naut skin card from Hoyts - upon reading it, it appears as though it was left over from the worlds event. Understandably that had expired also. 

Im not expecting you to be able to do anything with that - but it would be REALLY nice and appreciated, if you could grant me that one also!

Thanking you greatly. 

Kind Regards,
xxxxxxx




From: xxxxxxxxxxxxxx
To: xxxxxxxxxxx
Subject: RE: Your Hoyts Enquiry - Issue ID :088052
Date: Sat, 26 Dec 2015 23:28:11 +0000

No worries, I’ll have this dispatched in the morning so it should be with you on Tuesday or Wednesday.

 

The code for the skin that was in the pack has expired but you can get a new one from Riot games, here’s the note we received from them below:

If you have received your show bag, you may have found that the skins (download code) has now expired.

These skins were provided by Riot Games with the understanding that these would be distributed on the day of your session.

Although this skin has expired, the team at Riot Games will be reissuing the Arcade Riven skin for all ticketholders!

Ticketholders who do not currently own the champion Riven will also receive the champion.

To obtain your skin, Riot Games will need a copy of your booking confirmation along with your Summoner’s Name forwarded to OCEEvents@riotgames.com.

If you have purchased more than 1 (one) ticket, please provide one Summoner’s Name for each ticket holder, as downloads are limited to one per account / Summoner.

If you have any questions regarding your skin, please contact the team at Riot Games on OCEEvents@riotgames.com. 

If we can help with anything else please let us know.

 

 

Kind Regards,

 HOYTS Cinemas Sylvia Park | 286 Mt Wellington Highway|Sylvia Park|Auckland

Direct XXXXXXXXX | eXperience more

replies.body: I have just emailed you now :) Thank you heaps for the prompt response!!

Hey thats real weird,

Can you email me Maraudaur@riotgames.com with your summoner name, and HOYTS receipt and I will make sure you get the skin. Have you received the show bag already?

Hey there,

I've forwarded this thread to a Rioter for you :)
